name: TRASH MOUNTAIN (Andrew Karalis)
description:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Explore a Vertical Museum of Trash.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

“People say I'm extravagant because I want to be surrounded by beauty. But tell me, who wants to be surrounded by garbage?”
― Imelda Marcos

“Lovely flowers have been known to grow out of trash heaps”
― Elizabeth Kata

"One man's trash is another man's treasure"
― Albert Einstein

"What the hell, I'll just eat some trash."
― Jerry Seinfeld

***(CLARIFICATION: I do not think any assets used in this game are 'trash' or bad. I do however, find this game itself to be trash)***
